requirements: Defeat Local Legend: Polychrome Tri-Stars.
Defeat Vasily first, then defeat the other members of the Polychrome Tri-Stars.
Defeat the Polychrome Tri-Stars within 10s of defeating the first member.
Defeat Local Legend: Cocijo.
Defeat Cocijo before he forms a Thunderthorn Shield.
Defeat Cocijo after the Thunderthorn Shield has been formed, and without any character having been hit by the Shield's reflected attacks.
Defeat Local Legend: Sappho Amidst the Waves.
Defeat Sappho Amidst the Waves without being hit by her Shattering Ice attacks.
Defeat Sappho Amidst the Waves without allowing any of the Cryo spray cans to explode.
Defeat Local Legend: Balachko.
During the course of completing a single challenge, defeat no targets besides the original body while Balachko is using Shadowblade Tactics.
During the course of completing a single challenge, defeat 3 copies in a row before Balachko can unleash Shadowblade Tactics.
Defeat Local Legend: Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone.
During the course of completing a single challenge, break all the grappling anchor points before the Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone exits the hovering state.
Defeat the Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone while she is in the hovering state.
Defeat Local Legend: He Never Dies.
Defeat "He Never Dies" without being hit by "Ultimate Technique: Giant Undying Collision."
Defeat "He Never Dies" after interrupting the charging of "Ultimate Technique: Giant Undying Collision" 3 times.
Defeat Local Legend: Tlatzacuilotl.
During the course of completing a single challenge, break Tlatzacuilotl's shield each time with a single attack.
Defeat Tlatzacuilotl without being hit by any attacks.
Defeat Local Legend: Ichcahuipilli's Aegis.
During the course of completing a single challenge, defeat 10 Nightsoul Warriors during the Trial of Decisions.
Defeat Ichcahuipilli's Aegis without being hit by any attacks.
Defeat Local Legend: Chimalli's Shade.
Defeat Chimalli's Shade without any characters being downed.
During the course of a single challenge, when Chimalli's Shade absorbs "Hydroflow Constructs," break her Elemental Shield by launching frozen "Hydroflow Constructs."
Defeat Local Legend: Atlatl's Blessing.
During the course of completing a single challenge, use Parry to counterattack all of Atlatl's Blessing's power attacks and inflict damage.
Defeat Atlatl's Blessing without taking any damage from attacks.
